Article.ArticleTitle: [A comparative evaluation of the effect of the dust factor on the respiratory organs of workers in contact with drug and plant dusts].

AbstractText: A comparative analysis of the data on the influence of complex medicinal and vegetable dusts (jute, flax, kenaf) on the respiratory organs, revealed the clinical signs of the byssinosis symptom-group in 49 cases (7.34%) of 667 technological textile workers investigated, and 10 cases (5.8%) of 171 tablet shop workers at a pharmaceutical plant. Byssinosis and its syndrome developed among the workers engaged in "dust shops" after 13 +/- 2.5 years of work. Similarity of the clinical symptoms was also proved by bronchospasm pharmacological diagnostic test (to a greater degree than in the sample group).

Article.VernacularTitle: Sravnitel'naia otsenka vliianiia pylevogo faktora na organy dykhaniia u rabotaiushchikh v kontakte s lekarstvennoĭ i rastitel'noĭ pyl'iu.

MeshHeadingList.DescriptorName: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions
